library:
<class name="iirob_filters/GravityCompensatorDouble" type="iirob_filters::GravityCompensator" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
This is a gravity compensator.
<class name="iirob_filters/LowPassFilterDouble" type="iirob_filters::LowPassFilter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
This is a low pass filter.
<class name="iirob_filters/ThresholdFilterDouble" type="iirob_filters::ThresholdFilter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
This is a threshold filter.
<class name="iirob_filters/LowPassFilterWrench" type="iirob_filters::LowPassFilter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
This is a low pass filter working with geometry_msgs::WrenchStamped.
<class name="iirob_filters/GravityCompensatorWrench" type="iirob_filters::GravityCompensator" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
This is a gravity compensator working with geometry_msgs::WrenchStamped.
<class name="iirob_filters/ThresholdFilterWrench" type="iirob_filters::ThresholdFilter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
This is a threshold filter working with geometry_msgs::WrenchStamped.
<class name="iirob_filters/MultiChannelLowPassFilter" type="iirob_filters::MultiChannelLowPassFilter" base_class_type="filters::MultiChannelFilterBase">
This is a low pass filter which works on a stream of vectors of doubles.
<class name="iirob_filters/MultiChannelThresholdFilter" type="iirob_filters::MultiChannelThresholdFilter" base_class_type="filters::MultiChannelFilterBase">
This is a threshold filter which works on a stream of vectors of doubles.
<class name="iirob_filters/MultiChannelGravityCompensator" type="iirob_filters::MultiChannelGravityCompensator" base_class_type="filters::MultiChannelFilterBase">
